p: Adding wMel Wolbachia to the AR wP line ( wPip-only infected) led to a significant increase in the overall Wolbachia titer (F (1,18) = 51.346; P < 0.005) which, specifically, was about 15 fold higher in the AR wP-M compared to the AR wP females ( Fig 3). The increase in Wolbachia density in AR wP-M males was less evident but significant as well (F (1,18) = 12.673; P < 0.005). The titer of wPip Wolbachia seemed to be not affected by the introduction of the additional Wolbachia strain (females: F (1,18) = 0.133; P = 0.720; males: F (1,18) = 0.136; P = 0.716).
